TopicTitle: KSP: How not to be bored

Articles.Content:
I haven\'t been here for some times so now, with the new parts and EVAs, I decided to make a new user-submitted guide: HOW NOT TO BE BORED! Anyone can put their own idea in, and it doesn\'t even require approval from me!

Here\'s an example of your submittion:

Step # (# being number of steps, mine is the first one): DESC

Optional picture would be here, inside a spoiler.

MINE:

Step 1: Make an orbiter that can nuke with the new srbs
Step 2: Ladders for kerbals to cling on to as they are launched from the orbiter, Slim Pickens style.
create a series of objects that can land on each other on the mun, then use EVA to play the largest scale janga (sp) ever.
Make a stack of rcs fuel tanks with ladders and see who can take the biggest fall before dying!

Make a space plane. That\'s not symmetrical*. And is launched from 50 meters in the air via launch clamps.

*not hard. My most stable space plane was one that had all the wings on it\'s right half ripped off during launch.
Step 6: Crash the spaceplane into the orbiter
Technically, no spaceplane is radially symmetrical, since the wheels are only on one side.
Step 7: Decorate your rocket with hanging kerbals - a perfect Christmas decoration.

step 9: attach a second kerbal to the outside of a space plane and see how long it takes for them to fall off.

OT: op, love the name. just finished portal 2. hah!

Step 8: Install the crew tank and MechJeb, make a huge space station with a MJ on the launch vehicle\'s final stage, launch it to wherever you want (with or without MJ, it\'s only required a bit later), eject the station, set MJ to hold your launch vehicle at retrograde, engage the engines weakly (MJ modules may not provide any force on their own, but they\'ll control any force you give them... at least, they did when I used them...) until at retrograde, then burn at full power until on a collision course with Kerbin. Accelerate time until the launch vehicle crashes into Kerbin, and begin filling up your station.

Or if you hate MJ for some reason, have your command pod on the launch vehicle and kill a d00d. Yes, male kerbals are called d00ds.
Make a small rover COVERED in ladders and take kerbals from another ship and hang them on the sides. Congratulations, you\'ve just made a bus.

Then you can perform a BUSTACULAR VOYAGE to the MUNTACULAR ROCK in your SPACETACULAR ADVENTURES.

Step 11a: crash a crew into the mun

Step 11b: rescue them with crew tank on your lander

Step 11c (optional) 'accidentley' eject crew tank during reentry
